title: Gradient Minimal Watch Face
summary: Gradient is a admirable watch face for Moto 360, LG Watch & others android wear
description: Model NumberDW-A26CategoryDecentProduct description Gradient Watch Face is an admirable watch face for all smart watches (It has been tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R and Sony Smart watch 3).it is available for all kind of watches including round and rectangle. Disconnect devices (watch and phone)2. Uninstall the watch face3. Restart watch and connect device again4. Then finally install the watch faceTo install:1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.2. Long press your android wear watch and choose Gradient Watch Face as your watch faceNotePlease, rate us positive if you like our watch faces! descriptionHTML:
Model Number
DW-A26

Category
Decent

Product description
Gradient Watch Face is an admirable watch face for all smart watches (It has been tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R and Sony Smart watch 3).it is available for all kind of watches including round and rectangle.

Keep an eye out for our others watch face creations that are coming out soon!
Follow Us on Twitter ! http://www.twitter.com/droiipd
Like Us on Facebook ! http://www.facebook.com/droiipd
Follow Us on Instagram ! https://www.instagram.com/droiipd
Follow Us on Google Plus ! https://plus.google.com/104043898612133973188
It has following features

Features:
✔ Light & Dark Theme
✔ Date
✔ Smooth & Tick Needles
✔ Custom Ambient Mode
✔ Default Ambient Modes Pack
Configuration:
✔ switch between Tick & smooth needle style
✔ switch between light & dark theme
✔ choose your favorite ambient mode
✔ Turn on/off date display



For Email support Contact us at droiipd@gmail.com

Tip 1
Now we support 280x280 and 320x320 square watches
Tip 2
✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after re-sync, try these steps:
1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone)
2. Uninstall the watch face
3. Restart watch and connect device again
4. Then finally install the watch face
To install:
1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.
2. Long press your android wear watch and choose Gradient Watch Face as your watch face
Note

Please, rate us positive if you like our watch faces! Don't give a bad rating too soon. If you experienced a problem, please, send us an email and we will be happy to answer it and fix an issue soon as possible.
Compatible with Moto360, LG G Watch R, Sony smart watches...

(Note: You can do all the customization from the Our Mobile App, you can open our mobile app from you application menu)

And that is not the end of it watch for the new customization options and features coming soon, and we'd love to hear from you what you would like to see on it!
comments: Won't leave you alone until you rate it I keep getting notifications constantly to rate this watch face. It's a fine watch face, but I don't want to be spammed 4 times a day from a tiny app among hundreds on my phone. It's just ridiculous. Please fix it.

Garbage Crashes on the watch and on the Android Wear app. And doesn't stop pestering you to rate it 5 stars. So here you go, dev. You earned 1 star for being annoying. Maybe if the face worked you'd get more, but this was a waste of time.

Spamming me to rate it? Here is an 1 star rating just to make it obvious how much I hate your tactics. Btw, I am considering paying but I won't because you've put more effort into the spamming compared to everything else.

Doesn't look like screenshots without paying/demo Screenshots show dates and both black & white backgrounds. Date and white require an upgrade to pro version. No mention of this in app description. Might have paid but for the deceptive description.
Forces you to review app 1 star for continuing to force a review even after I have said no ever and over.
This app pesters me several times per day to leave a 5-star review.
